item.title: Beyond Accuracy: Tracking more like Human via Visual Search
item.description: CPDTrack: Human-like Visual Search Boosts Object Tracking!

item.title: Coevolving with the Other You: Fine-Tuning LLM with Sequential Cooperative Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning
item.description: CORY: a novel multi-agent RL framework boosts LLM fine-tuning!

item.title: MemVLT: Vision-Language Tracking with Adaptive Memory-based Prompts
item.description: MemVLT: Adaptive Vision-Language Tracking leverages memory to generate dynamic prompts, surpassing existing methods by adapting to changing target appearances.
